channel.title: Need Someone to make a server please
channel.description:
[glow=blue,2,300] Can someone please make me a server? I tried my hardest with a bunch of sources but I CANT GET IT!!! im soo frustrated so can someone make my server??? heres some information.... [/glow]
[glow=Black,2,300]When You Log IN Show A new screen saying this exactly...
Welcome to Anci3nt Scap3!
Owner = Pked You Admin = Duh Pur3, Q P 0 O Nz Q
PLEASE TYPE ::disclaimer BEFORE YOU PLAY!!!
Now have some fun you bitches![/glow]
[glow=blue,2,300]All shops Center Varrock, Alot Of Codes and ::maxadmin for all admins only not mods mkay?? ::phats and::masks for admins only summoning in inventory 100mill each mask and phat in inv. ::elitepk for tele 2 wilderness and have armor pking shops and weapons seperate shops like -melee shop-range shop-magic shop-all for armour and -weapons shop-armorshop- thats all for dat.
[glow=purple,2,300][/glow]Now for the logout part this...
To logout click below [CLICK HERE TO LOGOUT OF Anci3nt Scap3][/glow]
[size=24pt]I WANT THIS TO BE A PK SERVER PLEASE![/size][/size]
Thanks soo much you will be---
-Admin -Co-Owner
Give me the i.p. somewhat like Anci3nt-Scap3.no-ip.(info)(org)(biz)(anything really) please
i give you thanks soooo much! please!! thanks!!! co-owner and admin is good!!! plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz!!! thanks!!![br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 08:34:33 PM[/size][hr]~BUMP~[glow=blue,2,300] :)[/glow]
This Will Explain Most Things And Post Everything In HERE!!!
[glow=black,2,300]http://anci3ntscap3.smfforfree2.com/index.php/board,2.0.html[/glow]
